java/liquibase/change/CreateSequenceChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.CreateSequenceStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Sequence;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00010 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.util.Arrays;
00015 import java.util.HashSet;
00016 import java.util.Set;
00017 
00021 public class CreateSequenceChange extends AbstractChange {
00022 
00023     private String schemaName;
00024     private String sequenceName;
00025     private Integer startValue;
00026     private Integer incrementBy;
00027     private Integer maxValue;
00028     private Integer minValue;
00029     private Boolean ordered;
00030 
00031 
00032     public CreateSequenceChange() {
00033         super("createSequence", "Create Sequence");
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getSchemaName() {
00037         return schemaName;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00041         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getSequenceName() {
00045         return sequenceName;
00046     }
00047 
00048     public void setSequenceName(String sequenceName) {
00049         this.sequenceName = sequenceName;
00050     }
00051 
00052     public Integer getStartValue() {
00053         return startValue;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public void setStartValue(Integer startValue) {
00057         this.startValue = startValue;
00058     }
00059 
00060     public Integer getIncrementBy() {
00061         return incrementBy;
00062     }
00063 
00064     public void setIncrementBy(Integer incrementBy) {
00065         this.incrementBy = incrementBy;
00066     }
00067 
00068     public Integer getMaxValue() {
00069         return maxValue;
00070     }
00071 
00072     public void setMaxValue(Integer maxValue) {
00073         this.maxValue = maxValue;
00074     }
00075 
00076     public Integer getMinValue() {
00077         return minValue;
00078     }
00079 
00080     public void setMinValue(Integer minValue) {
00081         this.minValue = minValue;
00082     }
00083 
00084     public Boolean isOrdered() {
00085         return ordered;
00086     }
00087 
00088     public void setOrdered(Boolean ordered) {
00089         this.ordered = ordered;
00090     }
00091 
00092     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00093         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(sequenceName) == null) {
00094             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("sequenceName is required", this);
00095         }
00096 
00097     }
00098 
00099     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00100         return new SqlStatement[] {
00101                 new CreateSequenceStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getSequenceName())
00102                 .setIncrementBy(getIncrementBy())
00103                 .setMaxValue(getMaxValue())
00104                 .setMinValue(getMinValue())
00105                 .setOrdered(isOrdered())
00106                 .setStartValue(getStartValue())
00107         };
00108     }
00109 
00110     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00111         DropSequenceChange inverse = new DropSequenceChange();
00112         inverse.setSequenceName(getSequenceName());
00113         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00114 
00115         return new Change[]{
00116                 inverse
00117         };
00118     }
00119 
00120     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00121         return "Sequence " + getSequenceName() + " created";
00122     }
00123 
00124     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00125         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("createSequence");
00126         node.setAttribute("sequenceName", getSequenceName());
00127         if (getMinValue() != null) {
00128             node.setAttribute("minValue", getMinValue().toString());
00129         }
00130         if (getMaxValue() != null) {
00131             node.setAttribute("maxValue", getMaxValue().toString());
00132         }
00133         if (getIncrementBy() != null) {
00134             node.setAttribute("incrementBy", getIncrementBy().toString());
00135         }
00136         if (isOrdered() != null) {
00137             node.setAttribute("ordered", isOrdered().toString());
00138         }
00139 
00140         if (getStartValue() != null) {
00141             node.setAttribute("startValue", getStartValue().toString());
00142         }
00143 
00144         return node;
00145     }
00146 
00147 
00148     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00149         Sequence dbObject = new Sequence();
00150         dbObject.setName(sequenceName);
00151 
00152         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00153     }
00154 }
